column5: I think I'll end my Pike season with this catch... No measurements   Here's a few from this season... 42inches
need to find me one of these big girls this weekend!  Nicely done!
You are like Wilson from Home Improvement ! nice pike this season. Well done
Some really nice  fish, and that’s super cool that you caught the same pig 3 weeks later. and I agree with MSP !!
Haha... thanks guys I also wanted to share this... I bought a Waterwolf camera last year and had lots of fun using it.  It was cool to see what was happening under water.
